text: Welcome Back to Virginias Insurance Marketplace Sign into your account anytime to make a payment, report a Qualifying Life Event, or shop other plansfor you and your family.Login Need To Make Changes to Your Health Plan? You can change your coverage during the Open Enrollment Period (November 1 through January 15) or during a Special Enrollment Period (anytime outside of open enrollment) if you experience a Qualifying Life Event.To make changes to your coverage, log in to your account where you can update your application, change your health plan, and make your first monthly payment. You must make your first monthly payment (called the premium) for your new coverage to begin. Making payments is easy  plus, the Marketplace has options for applying for financial assistance. Helpful Resources: Consider these questions when choosing a plan.Download the Marketplace enrollment checklist.Visit the Marketplace Help Center to get contact information for assistance over the phone or in person.Follow the links to see plans offering health and dental coverage for 2024.Free translation services are available. Call the Consumer Assistance Center at 1-888-687-1501 for assistance. Need To Update Your Contact Information? In the event you experience any household changes, make sure to update your insurance application within 30 days of the change. Updating your information is easy. Just log in and go to your account page. Enter your up-to-date contact information and select save.Login Find a Virginia Certified Assister Assisters in your community can help with every step of the application and enrollment process. They provide free, unbiased enrollment assistance, with options to meet virtually or in person. Find Help Call Customer Service Contact the Marketplaces customer service representatives if you need assistance enrolling in a health plan, need to update your personal information, or have any questions. Contact Us Find a Virginia Certified Agent Whether youre shopping as an individual, family, or small business with employees, a Virginia Licensed Insurance Agent can provide you with free personalized plan recommendations and enrollment support. Find an Agent Get the Latest Marketplace News Sign up to receive the latest news and updates from Virginias Insurance Marketplace.
